rankings.title: Tight Labor Markets and the Crisis in Home Care — Within-State Evidence from Medicaid Provider Billing
conditions: extending/strengthening pre-trend diagnostics—ideally add earlier years or very strong placebo tests
validating county location using beneficiary county or service location where possible rather than NPPES mailing ZIP
showing Bartik robustness to alternative industry sets
controlling for Medicaid enrollment/demand shocks

rankings.title: Minimum Wage Bindingness and HCBS Provider Supply
conditions: redesigning around “first full quarter/year of exposure”
excluding partial quarters
documenting/validating bindingness with wage distribution evidence
restricting to states with adequate pre-period
stable coding/claims completeness

rankings.title: Broadband Access and Telehealth Adoption in Medicaid
conditions: a rigorous telehealth coding validation plan—modifier/POS crosswalks by state
year
excluding states/periods with poor encounter completeness
using an alternative broadband measure or triangulating FCC with Ookla/Microsoft usage data
handling partial-exposure quarters

rankings.title: Rural Hospital Closures and the Substitution to Home-Based Care
Market Power and the Pass-Through of Medicaid Rate Increases
